嵑字的基本解释

嵑
kě
〔嶱嵑〕山石高峻的样子。

嵑
jié
古同“碣”，碑石。
山突兀耸立。

嵑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kě］
［《廣韻》苦曷切，入曷，溪。］
(1)见“嶱嵑”。
[②]［jié］
［《集韻》其謁切，入月，羣。］
同“碣1”。
石碑。

嵑字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嵑； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页316第27
【廣韻】苦葛切【集韻】丘葛切，?音渴。【廣韻】嵑?，山貌。　又山特立也。【前漢·竇憲傅】封神丘兮建隆嵑。【註】嵑，?碣也。　【集韻】碣或作嵑。

嵑字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嵑字的起名意思

暂无。

嵑
Basic explanation of words
嵑
kě
〔嶱嵑〕The mountains and rocks look high and steep.
嵑
jié
The ancient "Jie", the stele.
The mountain stands abruptly.
嵑
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [kě]
["Guangyun" bitterly cut, into the river, the stream. ]
(1) See "嶱嵑".
[②]［jié］
["Ji Yun" it cuts, enters the month, group. ]
Same as "Jie 1".
Stele.
嵑
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嵑; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 316 27
[Guang Yun] bitter Ge cut [Ji Yun] Qiu Ge cut, sound thirsty. [Guang Yun] Gu?, mountain appearance.　It's also a mountain. [Former Han·Dou Xianfu] Fengshenqiu Xi built Longfang. [Note] Gu,? Jie also.　【Jiyun】Jie or Zuo 嵑.
